# ByteArrayExtensions.GetDoubleWord method

Returns a Double Word from this array of bytes starting in *start*.

```csharp
public static int GetDoubleWord(this byte[] data, byte start)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| data | Target data. |
| start | Start byte. |

## Return Value

A Int32 containing the value.
